program_html.locator: lambda:(() => { try { return document.querySelector('#maincontent > div.page-title-wrapper.product > h1 > span').textContent } catch (e) { return '' }})()

intent_template: I really like {{stuff}}. Can you find me {{product}} and add it to my shopping cart?

program_html.locator: lambda:(() => { try { return Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.item-info')).find(el => el.textContent.includes('Girls Leopard Print Bedding Set Teens Luxury Pink Black Cheetah Print Bed Sheet Set Twin Size for Kids Children Women Bedroom Decor Fitted Sheet Chic Wild Animal Bed Cover with 1 Pillow Case')).querySelector('td.col.item > div > dl > dd:nth-child(4)').textContent.trim() } catch (e) { return '' }})()
